articles.title: Chris Umphlett
articles.contents:
Chris Umphlett
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            A part of good science is to see what everyone else can see but to think what no one else has ever said ~ Amos Tversky
            
            Bio
            Chris is the Manager of Data Analysis and Data Privacy at TechSmith, the makers of great software like Snagit and Camtasia. At TechSmith he works with stakeholders across the company on analytics and data science projects like building summary reports in Power BI, creating ETL processes to collect data via a vendor API, developing an R Shiny app that forecasts license activations, and survey analysis.
            Chris is the author of several R packages hosted on CRAN:
            marketr
            ibmAcousticR
            revulyticsR
            zdeskR
            Chris lives in East Lansing, MI with his wife and four young children.
            
            
            Education
            Central Michigan University | MA, Economics | Aug 2010 - May 2012
            Univ of North Carolina, Chapel Hill | BS, Business Administration & Minor, Anthropology | Aug 2002 - May 2006
            
            
            Career
            TechSmith | Manager of Data Analysis and Data Privacy | Dec 2019 - Present
            Consumers Energy | Data Scientist | Oct 2018 - Dec 2019
            Jackson National Life | Sr Operations Data Analyst | Mar 2012 - Sept 2018
            Kellogg’s | Intern, Sales Analytics | May 2011 - Mar 2012
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Chris Umphlett
